category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAssignAttachmentAndRelationToUseInCopyRule
preference.preference_description: Defines the attachment and relation types that are referenced or copied when assigning from an EBOM to an MBOM. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values, each string must have the following format: AttachmentType:RelationType:CopyRule AttachmentType and RelationType are the internal names of the attachment and relation types, and CopyRule is either the Copy or Reference rule. Currently, only Reference is supported.For example, if you create a custom form and attach it to an object, the Attachments view is displayed as follows:The attachment type is Customform, and the relation type is Specifications. To define the attachment and relation type for this example, the preference has the following value:Customform:IMAN_specification:ReferenceThe internal name of the relation is IMAN_specification. The internal and display name of the custom form are the same.
